attributes.action: Stop sunongtir selling his lovely silver gti
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Sunongtir wishes to sell his very clean silver gti for very little money, we can not let this happen as there are many cruises that he and stufa can go to together, ALC for life x x

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
